title: Vanderpump Rules Trailer Recap + Matt Dillon!
itunes:title: Vanderpump Rules Trailer Recap + Matt Dillon!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps the brand-new trailer for the upcoming season of Vanderpump Rules! After that, actor Matt Dillon stops by to discuss his work on There's Something About Mary, The Outsiders, his new film El Gran Fellove, and more! Finally, boxer Chris...
description:
Danny recaps the brand-new trailer for the upcoming season of Vanderpump Rules! After that, actor Matt Dillon stops by to discuss his work on There's Something About Mary, The Outsiders, his new film El Gran Fellove, and more! Finally, boxer Christy Martin discusses opening up her life on Netflix's UNTOLD.


Matt Dillon Interview: 25:55ish

Christy Martin Interview: 42:26ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
